alert.note: Alert for Chester; Laurens; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 9:08AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, Chester, southwestern York and southern Union Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 908 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of VC Summer Nuclear Station, or 6 miles northwest of Blair, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Clinton, Joanna, Carlisle, Mcconnells, Lowrys, Chester State Park, Rose Hill State Park, Blackstock and Leeds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
